info.title: Public API for Oneflow
info.description: Use Oneflow API in Power Automate! Create and manage your contracts through flows.

get.summary: Get a party from a contract
get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve a party from a contract.

delete.summary: Delete a contract party by ID
delete.description: Use this endpoint to delete a specific contract party by its ID.

get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the list of parties for the specified contract ID.

post.description: Use this Action to add participants to your contract

get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the list of data fields for the specified contract ID.

get.summary: Get contract data field by id
get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve a specific contract data field by its ID.
Use this endpoint to retrieve the list of events available for the specified contract ID.

get.summary: Get a contract event by ID
get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve a specific contract event by its ID.

post.description: Add attachment or a  PDF document to a contract.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File to upload. File name should be in file.ext format

parameters.name: upload_as
parameters.description: select type of attachment to upload

get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the list of all files available for the specified contract ID, which includes the contract itself, contract verification, attachments, and PDF documents.
Retrieve a specific contract file by its ID.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: Type of file: * 1 - Contract PDF * 2 - Verification

get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve a specific contract by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a specific contract by its ID.

get.summary: Get the status of a contract
get.description: Retrieve the status of a specific contract by its ID.

post.description: Use this endpoint to create an access link to a contract for a specific participant.
Sends contract to participants for signing.

get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the list of contracts available for the specified account.

post.description: Create a new contract based on the selected template.

get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the list of templates available for the specified user.
Use this endpoint to retrieve a specific template by its ID.
Retrieve the list of workspaces available for the specified user.
Use this endpoint to retrieve a specific workspace by ID.
Use this endpoint to check if the Oneflow API is available.
Get a list of templates for a specified workspace.

workspace_id.description: Select a Workspace for your contract

template_id.description: Select a template to create your contract from

country_code.description: The country code of the individual party.

identification_number.description: The date of birth, SSN, personal ID or similar of the individual party.

my_party.description: Whether the party belongs to the current user or not.

name.description: The name of the individual party.

delivery_channel.description: The Delivery Channel to set for participant.

identification_number.description: The date of birth, SSN, personal number, etc., of the participant.

my_participant.description: Whether the participant represents the current user or not.

organizer.description: A flag to indicate if the participant is an owner-side internal participant. Only for the owner-side participants.

phone_number.description: The mobile phone number of the participant.

sign_method.description: One of the Sign Methods to select for the participant.

signatory.description: Indicates if the participant can sign the contract.

_permissions.description: Defines permissions for the contract participant.

contract:update.description: Indicates whether the participant is allowed to make changes in the contract.

country_code.description: The country code of the party.

identification_number.description: The date of birth, SSN, personal ID or similar of the company.

my_party.description: Whether the party belongs to the current user or not.

preferred.x-ms-summary: Is Preferred Two Step Authentication Method

required_participant_attributes.x-ms-summary: Required Participant Attributes (Two Step Authentication Method)

has_passed_notice_period_start_time.x-ms-summary: Has Contract Passed Notice Period Start Time?

sign_state_updated_time.x-ms-summary: Individual Participant's Sign State Updated Time
